title: Graduate School Application Essentials
text:
Application Components

Statement of Purpose
Transcripts (minimum 3.0 GPA)
Letters of Recommendation (3)
GRE Scores (General Test)
Resume/CV
Writing Sample (if required)
Application Fee


Emphasize the importance of starting early on each component.

title: Graduate School Application Essentials
text:
Key Preparation Steps

Research potential programs and faculty
Gain research experience
Build strong relationships with professors
Prepare for and take the GRE
Draft and refine your statement of purpose
Compile a comprehensive CV
Request letters of recommendation early


Stress the significance of research experience and networking.

title: Graduate School Application Essentials
text:
Timeline and Deadlines
October:

finalize list of labs,
contact recommenders

Take GRE if needed
finalize statement of purpose

November:

Submit applications (typical deadline: December 1)


Remind students to check specific deadlines for each program.

title: Graduate School Application Essentials
text:
Tips for Success

Start early and stay organized
Tailor applications to each program
Highlight research experience and interests
Demonstrate fit with program and potential advisors
Proofread all materials carefully
Prepare for interviews
Consider backup plans (e.g., post-bac programs, research assistant positions)


Encourage students to seek feedback on their application materials.
